BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.name: IATI
BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.description: The budget identifier reported uses IATI budget identifier categories

BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.name: Country Chart of Accounts
BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to the recipient country chart of accounts

BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.name: Other Country System
BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to a recipient country system other than the chart of accounts

BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.name: Reporting Organisation
BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to categories that are specific to the reporting organisation

BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.name: Other
BudgetIdentifierVocabulary.description: The budget identifier reported uses a different vocabulary, not specified in the codelist
